entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is a person who tries to help Bill and sends a candle toppling onto the last piece of parchment. ("He tried," said Tonks, striding over to help Bill and immediately sending a candle toppling onto th e last piece of parchment.)

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is a person who needs help from Tonks. ("He tried," said Tonks, striding over to help Bill and immediately sending a candle toppling onto th e last piece of parchment.)

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is a person who helps repair the parchment with her wand. ("Here, dear," said Mrs. Weasley, sounding exasperated, and she re-paired the parchment with  a wave of her wand)

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who catches a glimpse of the plan of a building in the flash of light caused by Mrs Weasley's charm. (In the flash of light caused by Mrs Weasley’s charm,  Harry caught a glimpse of what looked like the plan of a building.)

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus is a person who has been met by Harry. ("Sit down, Harry," said Sirius. "You’ve met Mundungus, haven’t you?")

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a person who tells Harry that he has met Mundungus. ("Sit down, Harry," said Sirius. "You’ve met Mundungus, haven’t you?")

relationships.description: Tonks tries to help Bill. ("He tried," said Tonks, striding over to help Bill and immediately sending a candle toppling onto th e last piece of parchment.)
Mrs Weasley repairs the parchment with her wand. ("Here, dear," said Mrs. Weasley, sounding exasperated, and she re-paired the parchment with  a wave of her wand)

Harry catches a glimpse of the plan of a building in the flash of light caused by Mrs Weasley's charm. (In the flash of light caused by Mrs Weasley’s charm,  Harry caught a glimpse of what looked like the plan of a building.)
Mrs Weasley unloads dinner plates from an ancient dresser. (She snapped before sweep ing off toward an ancient dresser from which she started un loading dinner plates.)
Bill makes the scrolls vanish with his wand. (Bill took out his wand, muttered “ Evanesco!” and the scrolls vanished.)
Sirius mentions Mundungus to Harry. ("Sit down, Harry," said Sirius. "You’ve met Mundungus, haven’t you?")
